properties.areaDesc: Washington, GA; Wilkinson, GA; Johnson, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 8 at 8:09AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Oconee River near Milledgeville affecting Baldwin...Washington and
Wilkinson Counties


...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...
Oconee River near Penfield affecting Clarke...Greene and Oconee
Counties

Buffalo Creek near Oconee affecting Washington County

Oconee River near Oconee affecting Johnson...Washington and
Wilkinson Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Oconee River near Oconee.
* Until further notice.
* At 7 AM Saturday the stage was 19.9 feet...and rising.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 17 feet.
* The river will continue rising to near 23.4 feet by Monday morning
then begin falling.
* At 23 feet...Moderate flooding continues. Portions of the Old
Balls Ferry Road leading to the boat ramp becomes flooded with a
foot of water or more.  The entire dirt parking lot near the boat
ramp is under three to five feet of water. Extensive flooding of
the woodlands near the river continues.
